lead_paragraph: Daisuke Matsuzaka will head home to Japan after all — maybe to start the earliest season opener in baseball history. His wife, who is in Boston, gave birth Saturday to their second child, their first son. That allows Matsuzaka to travel with his Boston teammates to Tokyo on Wednesday. He is expected to start one of the regular-season games in Tokyo on March 25 and 26 against Oakland.
